lead_paragraph: The opening of the Winter Olympics was supposed to be a triumph for Vladimir Putin that ended months of criticism of the Russian president over gay rights and talk of corruption surrounding the Games.

headline.main: Opening Ceremony Fails to Follow Putin's Script
headline.print_headline: Opening Ceremony Fails to Follow Putin's Script
